text: Etu nisena, jawan manu khan, apuni khan pora dangor umor thaka manu khan laga kotha mani kene thakibi. Apuni khan sob morom laga kapra pora nijorke lagai lobi aru ekjon-ekjon laga sewa koribi. Kelemane Isor to phutani kora manu ke bhal napai, kintu kun nomro kore taikhan ke anugrah diye5.5 Pro. 3:34..
